II fldgi – wêlrK

iïu; jQ mk;a ... ... ... ... —
mk;a flgqïm;a ... ... ... ... —
fY%aIaGdêlrKfha oekaùï ... ... ... ... —
Y%S ,xld weme,a Widúfha oekaùï ... ... ... —
fY%aIaGdêlrKfha wmrdO kvq ieis ms<sn| ksfõok ... —
Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK oekaùï ... 02
^fjk fjku f.dkq lr .; yels mßÈ iEu fldgilg u wh;a tla tla NdIdjlg fjk fjk msgq wxl fhdod we;'&
1- B 082091 — 353 (2021/01)
D 1 -
  msgqj 
jia;= Nx.;aj kvq ms<sn| oekaùï ... ... ... —
msial,a ud¾I,ajrekaf.a m;a lsÍï ... ... ... —

Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h 
 fuu .eiÜ m;%h www.documents.gov.lk fjí wvúfhka nd.; l< yel' 
i;sm;d ksl=;a jk .eiÜ m;%fhys m<lsÍu i|yd Ndr.kq ,nk oekaùï ms<sn|
jeo.;a ksfõokhhs 
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha wjika msgqfõ iEu udihl u uq,a i;sfha § m<lrk ksfõok Ndr.kakd Èkhka iy fõ,djka 
ms<sn|j ñka wjOdkh fhduq lrkq ,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lsÍu i|yd oekaùï Ndr.ekSu .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkhg i;s follg fmr isl=rdod Èkfhys oyj,a 12'00 g wjika 
lrkq ,efí' ;k;=re - wenE¾;=" úNd." fgkav¾ iy fjkafoais ms<sn| oekaùïj, wjika Èk iy fõ,djka ta ms<sn|j Wkkaÿjla olajk whg m%udKj;a 
ld,fõ,djla ,efnk mßÈ fhdod.; hq;= njg" ish¨ u fomd¾;fïka;=" ixia:d iy uKav, hkdÈh j.n,d.; hq;= nj ñka wjOdrKh flf¾' m<lsÍu 
i|yd tjkq ,nk iEu oekaùula u ;ks me;af;a muKla meyeÈ,sj msgm;a l< hq;= h' ksrjoH;djh ms<sn|j lrk úuiSï iy meñKs,s 
.eiÜ m;%h m< 
jQ Èk isg f;uilg miqj Ndr.kq fkd,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lrk iEu oekaùula u .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkg i;s follg fmr ^tkï" 2021 ckjdß ui 22 jeks Èk m<lrk 
.eiÜ m;%fha oekaùï 2021 ckjdß ui 08 jeks Èk oyj,a 12'00g fyda Bg fmr& ;emEf,ka fyda f.kú;a rcfha uqøKd,hg NdrÈh hq;= h'
    2006 wxl 19 ork bf,lafg%dksl .Kqfokq mk; - 9 jeks j.ka;sh
   zzhï m%ldYkhla" Í;shla" ksfhda.hla" kshuhla" w;=re jHjia:djla" ksfõokhla fyda fjk;a lsisjla .eiÜ m;%fha m<l< hq;= njg 
hï mk;lska fyda kS;s m%{ma;shlska úêúOdk i,iajd we;s wjia:djl" ta Í;sh" ksfhda.h" kshuh" w;=re jHjia:dj" ksfõokh fyda fjk;a foh 
bf,lafg%dksl iajrEmfha jk .eiÜ m;%hl m< lrkq ,enqjfyd;a ta úêúOdkh iïmQ¾K lr we;a;dla fia ie<lsh hq;= h'˜

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2021'01'01
2  
Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK oekaùï
Èid$ufyia;%d;a wêlrKh - rejkaje,a,
1984 wxl 12 ork fkdjákd f,aLk úkdY lsÍfï wd×mkf;a 5 jeks j.ka;sh m%ldrj lrkq ,nk ksfõokhhs
fuu wêlrKh bÈßfha wjika ù we;s jir mylg ^05& jvd mer‚ my; Wmf,aLkfha olajd we;s kvq jd¾;d 1984 wxl 
12 ork fkdjákd f,aLk úkdY lsÍfï wd×mkf;a 5 jeks j.ka;sfha úêúOdk m%ldrj fuu ±kaùu m, lrk ,o Èk isg 
udi ;=kla ^03& bl=;a ùfuka miqj úkdY lrk nj fuhska okajd isáñ'
   Wmf,aLkfha olajd we;s kvq jd¾;dj, msgm;a fyda f.dkq lr we;s hï f,aLk ,nd .ekSug Wkkaÿjla olajk 
;eke;a;ka úiska ±kaùu m%isoaO l< Èk isg udi ;=kla ^03& bl=;a ùug fmr tA i|yd b,a¨ï l< hq;= njg o" lsishï kvq 
jd¾;djla úkdY fkdl< hq;= njg Wkkaÿjla olajk ;eke;af;l= isà kï fuu oekaùu m%isoaO l< Èk isg udi ;=kla ^03& 
la bl=;a ùug fmr ;ud úiska kS;s{jrfhl= u.ska h:d mßÈ bÈßm;a lrkq ,nk fm;aiula u.ska idOdrK fya;= bÈßm;a 
lsÍug l%shd l< hq;= njg o fuhska ksfõokh lrkq ,efí'
 ã' tï' fldä;=jlal="
 Èid úksiqre$ufyia;%d;a"

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2021'01'01

uf.a wxlh ( r;a$ufya$wê$kvq jd'ú'ls$2020
ufyia;%d;a wêlrKh - r;akmqr
ld,h bl=;a jQ kvq jd¾;d úkdY lsÍu
r;akmqr ufyia;%d;a wêlrKfha mjrk ,ÿj wjika lrk ,o jir 05g jvd  mer‚ my; Wmf,aLkfha .eiÜ m;%fha 
i|yka kvq jd¾;d 2021'04'01 Èfkka miqj fuu wêlrK N+ñfha § mq¿iaid úkdY lsÍug kshñ; h'
   fuu kvq iïnkaOfhka hï md¾Yjlrefjl= ;udg wjYH iïmQ¾K msgm;la fyda tys fldgila ,nd .ekSug wjYH 
fõ kï tA i|yd b,a¨ïm;% 2021'02'01 Èkg fmr fuu wêlrKfha frðiag%d¾jrhd fj; bÈßm;a l< hq;= h'
   tfia b,a,Sula fkdjqjfyd;a my; Wmf,aLkfha i|yka kvq jd¾;d 2021'04'01 Èfkka miqj fuu wêlrK N+ñfha §

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2021'01'01
39
1' È<s÷ mjq,aj, olaI;d we;s orejkag Wiia wOHdmkh i|yd w;aje,la imhñka Tjqka Wiia iudc ;,hlg 
f.k tAu i|yd wjYH m%;smdok iy fN!;sl øjHhka ,nd§u'
2' ldka;djkag w;aje,la imhñka iajhx /lshd jHdmD;ska ls%hd;aul lsÍu iy mj;ajdf.k hdu i|yd m%;smdok 
,nd§u" tA fjkqfjka mdGud,d ls%hd;aul lsÍu iy mj;ajdf.k hdu'
3' iudc fiajd lghq;= ls%hd;aul lsÍu iy wd.ñl ia:dk fukau fkdfhl=;a uyck wjYH;djhka fjkqfjka 
we;s fmdÿ ia:dk ixj¾Okh" kv;a;=j iy tA yd iïnkaO ish¨u lghq;= mj;ajdf.k hdu iy úúO wjYH;d 
we;s mqoa.,hka fj; wdOdr ,nd§u'
k,ska m%kdkaÿ"
md¾,sfïka;= uka;S%'
01-372
úúO oekaùï
k,ska m%kdkaÿ moku
ixia:d.; lsÍu i|yd jQ mk;ls
k,ska rejkaÔj m%kdkaÿ jk uu YS% ,xld m%cd;dka;s%l iudcjd§ ckrcfha md¾,sfïka;=fõ ia:djr ksfhda.j, wxl 53^1& ork 
ia:djr ksfhda. hgf;a zzk,ska m%kdkaÿ moku ixia:d.; lsÍu i|yd jQ mk;lsZZ hkqfjka ye¢kafjk mk;a flgqïm;la 
md¾,sfïka;=fõ§ bÈßm;a lsÍug woyia lrk nj fuhska ±kqï foñ'
mk;a flgqïmf;a wruqK jkqfha my; i|yka
fmdÿ mrud¾:j,ska hqla; jkakd jQ tlS moku ixia:d.; lsÍuhs

<!-- page 40 -->

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2021'01'01
40  
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h 
±kaùï iy m%ldYkhka i|yd wh lrkq ,nk 
ixfYdaê; .dia;=
2013 ckjdß ui 01 jeks Èk isg 
^iEu isl=rdod Èkhkays .eiÜ m;%h m< lrkq ,efí'&
 
 1'  ish¨ u ±kaùï iy m%ldYkhka m< lrkq ,nkafka m%isoaO lrkakdf.a j.lSu msgh' 
 2'  fm!oa.,sl m<lrkakkaf.a ish¨ u ±kaùï iy m%ldYk ta i|yd kshñ; iïmQ¾K .dia;=j;a  iu. fld<U 08" fnd/,a," Y%S 
,xld rcfha uqøK fomd¾;fïka;=fõ uqøKd,hdêm;sg  ;emEf,ka tùug fyda f.keú;a  Ndr§ug mq¿jk'
 3'  ld¾hd, fõ,djka  fmrjre 8'30 isg miajre 4'15 olajd fõ'  
 4'  uqo,a .kqfokq  lrkq ,nkafka  fmrjre 9'00 isg miajre 3'00 olajd nj ie,lsh hq;= hs'

Y%S ,xld rcfha uqøK fomd¾;fïka;=fõ uqøKh lrk ,§' 
.eiÜ m;%h m< lsÍu ms<sn|j jeo.;a ksfõokhhs
i;sm;d uqøKh jk Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha  .eiÜ m;%h idudkHfhka  isl=rdod Èkj, m<  lrkq ,efí' 
isl=rdod Èkhla rcfha ksjdvq Èkhla jQ  úg tu isl=rdod  Èkg m%:u jev lrk Èkfha .eiÜ m;%h m< lrkq ,efí'  ta wkqj .eiÜ 
m;%fha  m< lsÍu i|yd  ksfõok Ndr.kakd wka;su  Èkh o tu i;sfha we;sjk  ksjdvq Èk .Kk wkqj fjkia  jkq  we;'
ta ta .eiÜ m;%fha m< lsÍu i|yd ±kaùï Ndr .kakd wka;su Èkh iy fõ,djka  my; m< lr we;s Wmf,aLkfha ±lafõ'  
my; i|yka  kshñ;  fõ,djg  miq ,efnk  ish¨u ±kaùï th tjQ wh fj; ;emEf,ka  wdmiq tjkq ,efí'  B<Õ .eiÜ m;%fha  
th m< l< hq;= kï wjYH ixfYdaOkhka lr wdmiq  túh hq;=h' rcfha  uqøKd,h fj; ;eme,a  u.ska tjk ±kaùï  wm%udoj tys 
,eîug iEfyk fõ,djla §  ;eme,a lsÍfuka  jqjukd  .eiÜ m;%hg ±kaùu we;=<;a  fjkjd fuka u th ish¨ fokdf.a u myiqjg 
o fya;= jk nj i<lkak'
